title: Chong Chong
synopsis: Chongchong is a four-year-old Chinese boy. His little head is always full of cute and strange ideas. He often unexpectedly asks some tricky questions that are difficult for adults to answer. He often makes many small questions in daily life. The situation makes adults dumbfounded, and it also brings out a lot of little fun in life. Chong Chong is father’s pistachio, mother’s good baby, kindergarten aunt’s little mischief, and a good partner for children. He lives happily in a joyous world, earnestly discovering and creating a beautiful world. (translated from baidu baike)
